quest.name: What's Mine Is Mine
journal: Zuzudesu needs an adventurer to do what they do best.
objectives: Seek out and defeat any Qiqirn meatcarriers near Specula Imperatoris.
Deliver the stolen wares to Zuzudesu.

dialogue.name: ZUZUDESU
dialogue.text: Hmmm... Yes, yes you'll do quite nicely.

dialogue.name: ZUZUDESU
dialogue.text: Zuzudesu's the name, and sutler for the Resistance is my trade. And you are an adventurer, are you not? If you're as well-traveled as you seem, then you must know where this conversation is going.

dialogue.name: ZUZUDESU
dialogue.text: I was making a routine shipment here to Ala Ghiri, when a band of Qiqirn attacked my wagon and relieved me of all my wares.

dialogue.name: ZUZUDESU
dialogue.text: For a blessing the crates were rather heavy, so I doubt they were able to carry them far, if at all.

dialogue.name: ZUZUDESU
dialogue.text: Would you go and recover them for me? They'd be heading back to the Carmine Kitchen, but I doubt they could make it much farther than the abandoned Garlean outpost to the north.

dialogue.name: ZUZUDESU
dialogue.text: Be wary of the Qiqirn. They're craftier than they would have you believe.

dialogue.name: ZUZUDESU
dialogue.text: The mighty adventurer returns, but has shehe completed the task set before herhim?

dialogue.name: ZUZUDESU
dialogue.text: Aha! I knew I was right to call on you. I have an eye for these things, you see.

dialogue.name: ZUZUDESU
dialogue.text: But it is not I who will benefit from your aid, but the good soldiers here in Ala Ghiri. I deliver all manner of supplies, from the armor on their backs to the bread in their bellies. The last thing we need is them marching into battle with empty hands or stomachs.

dialogue.name: ZUZUDESU
dialogue.text: And I would be to blame! Why, if you hadn't recovered those crates, I would have had no choice but to flee under the cover of night. Perhaps even assume a new identity.

dialogue.name: ZUZUDESU
dialogue.text: ...You don't believe me, do you? I should hope not. A merchant will sell nothing without a convincing smile to show his customers.

dialogue.name: ZUZUDESU
dialogue.text: Thanks to you, my smile remains genuine. For now, at least.

obj.n: For the Living and the Dead
